IF @Arguments_Trigger = 'PacketNo' BEGIN
-- do calculations based on the packetno entered
EXECUTE wa.pPickPickingPacket_PacketNoCalculate @PickingOrderNo OUTPUT ,@PickingPacketID OUTPUT ,@PacketNo OUTPUT ,@PacketHistoryID OUTPUT ,@PacketHistoryProductCode OUTPUT ,@PacketHistoryGcsl OUTPUT ,@Cube OUTPUT ,@Lineal OUTPUT ,@Pieces OUTPUT ,@OrderItemID OUTPUT ,@PickingOrderItemNo OUTPUT ,@OrderUnitOfMeasure OUTPUT ,@QuantityOrdered OUTPUT ,@QuantityPicked OUTPUT ,@Available OUTPUT ,@OverVolume OUTPUT ,@NotAvailable OUTPUT ,@NotInStock OUTPUT ,@NeverInStock OUTPUT ,@WrongProduct OUTPUT ,@Duplicate OUTPUT ,@Errors OUTPUT ,@PickingActionID OUTPUT ,@PickingActionName OUTPUT
-- insert record - regardless of errors for quick scanning
DECLARE @PickingPacketIDInserted int
--EXECUTE wa.[pPickPickingPacketInsert] EXECUTE wa.pPickPickingPacketInsert @PickingOrderNo ,@PacketNo ,@PacketHistoryID ,@OrderItemID ,@Available ,@OverVolume ,@NotAvailable ,@NotInStock ,@NeverInStock ,@WrongProduct ,@Duplicate ,@Errors ,@PickingActionID ,@BusinessRules_UserName ,@PickingPacketIDInserted OUTPUT
--SET @Result_ShowMessage = @Errors
-- set record back to empty ready for the next scan
SET @LastPacketNo = @PacketNo SET @PacketNo = null Set @PacketHistoryID = null SET @OrderItemID = null SET @Available = 0 SET @OverVolume = 0 SET @NotAvailable = 0 SET @NotInStock = 0 SET @NeverInStock = 0 SET @WrongProduct = 0 SET @Duplicate = 0 SET @Actioned = 0 SET @Posted = 0
SET @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1
END

update.Formula: ISNULL([TruckNo], 'Unknown') + ' Despatched at ' + CONVERT(nvarchar(30), [DespatchTime], 8) + ' on ' + CONVERT(nvarchar(30), [DespatchTime], 3)

ISNULL([TruckNo], 'Unknown') + ' Arrived at ' + CONVERT(nvarchar(30), [ArriveTime], 8) + ' on ' + CONVERT(nvarchar(30), [ArriveTime], 103)

update.Text: select "qDespatchLoadPacket"."LoadPacketID" "LoadPacketID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderItemID" "OrderItemID" ,"qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."PickingOrderNo" "PickingOrderNo" ,"qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."PickingOrderItemNo" "PickingOrderItemNo" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketNo" "PacketNo" ,"qDespatchPacketHistory"."GCSL" "PacketHistoryGcsl" ,"qDespatchPacketHistory"."Cube" "PacketHistoryCube" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."VerifiedTime" "VerifiedTime" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."VerifiedBy" "VerifiedBy" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Errors" "Errors" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Posted" "Posted" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."LoadID" "LoadID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Verified" "Verified" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderNo" "OrderNo" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Warnings" "Warnings" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketHistoryID" "PacketHistoryID" from "wa"."qDespatchLoadPacket" "qDespatchLoadPacket" left join "wa"."qDespatchPacketHistory" "qDespatchPacketHistory" on "qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketHistoryID" = "qDespatchPacketHistory"."PacketHistoryID" left join "wa"."qDespatchPickingOrderItem" "qDespatchPickingOrderItem" on "qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderItemID" = "qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."OrderItemID"

update.Script:

update.Text: select "qDespatchLoadPacket"."LoadPacketID" "LoadPacketID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderItemID" "OrderItemID" ,"qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."PickingOrderNo" "PickingOrderNo" ,"qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."PickingOrderItemNo" "PickingOrderItemNo" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketNo" "PacketNo" ,"qDespatchPacketHistory"."GCSL" "PacketHistoryGcsl" ,"qDespatchPacketHistory"."Cube" "PacketHistoryCube" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."VerifiedTime" "VerifiedTime" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."VerifiedBy" "VerifiedBy" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Errors" "Errors" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Posted" "Posted" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."LoadID" "LoadID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Verified" "Verified" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderNo" "OrderNo" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Warnings" "Warnings" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketHistoryID" "PacketHistoryID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."PostedPacketHistoryID" "PostedPacketHistoryID" ,"qDespatchLoadPacket"."Unpicked" "Unpicked" from "wa"."qDespatchLoadPacket" "qDespatchLoadPacket" left join "wa"."qDespatchPacketHistory" "qDespatchPacketHistory" on "qDespatchLoadPacket"."PacketHistoryID" = "qDespatchPacketHistory"."PacketHistoryID" left join "wa"."qDespatchPickingOrderItem" "qDespatchPickingOrderItem" on "qDespatchLoadPacket"."OrderItemID" = "qDespatchPickingOrderItem"."OrderItemID"

EXECUTE wa.pDespatchUnPickPack @PacketNo ,@Warnings OUTPUT ,@Errors OUTPUT ,@BusinessRules_UserName
IF @Errors IS NULL BEGIN SET @Result_Continue = 1 END ELSE BEGIN
END

EXECUTE wa.pDespatchUnPickPack @PacketNo ,@DisplayWarnings OUTPUT ,@DisplayErrors OUTPUT ,@BusinessRules_UserName
IF NOT @DisplayErrors IS NULL BEGIN SET @Result_ShowMessage = @DisplayErrors SET @Result_Continue = 0 END ELSE BEGIN SET @Result_Continue = 1 END

DECLARE @DisplayWarnings nvarchar(max) DECLARE @DisplayErrors nvarchar(max)
EXECUTE wa.pDespatchUnPickPack @PacketNo ,@DisplayWarnings OUTPUT ,@DisplayErrors OUTPUT ,@BusinessRules_UserName
IF NOT @DisplayErrors IS NULL BEGIN SET @Result_ShowMessage = @DisplayErrors SET @Result_Continue = 0 END ELSE BEGIN SET @Result_Continue = 1 END
